commit.message:
tree-ssa-dom.c (tree_ssa_dominator_optimize): Fix setting of CFG_ALTERED in the main DOM iteration loop.

        * tree-ssa-dom.c (tree_ssa_dominator_optimize): Fix setting of
        CFG_ALTERED in the main DOM iteration loop.

From-SVN: r95788
